name: Mukuvisi Woodlands
description: A nature sanctuary protecting indigenous wildlife and flora, offering walking trails and birdwatching.

name: Harare Botanical Gardens
address: Cnr of Jason Moyo & Samora Machel Ave, Harare
description: Beautiful botanical gardens with diverse plant species and picnic areas for families.

name: National Gallery of Zimbabwe
description: The premier art museum showcasing Zimbabwean contemporary and traditional artworks.

name: Harare City Library
description: Historic library with a vast collection of books and public resources.

name: Baobab Tree Park
description: Home to ancient baobab trees, offering scenic views and cultural heritage significance.

name: Zimbabwe Museum of Human Sciences
description: Museum displaying archaeological and anthropological exhibits about Zimbabwe’s heritage.

name: Nature Trail
description: A peaceful trail perfect for walking and enjoying indigenous birds and plants.

name: African Fish Eagle Sanctuary
description: Sanctuary known for the iconic African Fish Eagle, Zimbabwe’s national bird.
